Project Atlas

Designing a cinematic planning surface for distributed exploration teams.

Role
Lead Product Designer
Timeline
May 2023 — Sep 2023
Team
UX Researcher, Motion Designer
Read full case study ↗

Motion as narrative glue

Sequenced transitions signposted progress without overwhelming reduced-motion audiences.

Shared artifacts that evolve

Streamlined content blocks made it simple for teams to remix case studies.

Pilot Teams 5 orgs

Adopted Atlas into weekly planning within the first month.

Onboarding Time -30%

Narrative-led walkthrough cut team onboarding friction.

Building the narrative flow

Motion principle

Motion threads every interaction together while staying respectful of reduced-motion preferences. Pauses and easing communicate pacing instead of raw velocity.

The Atlas storyline was written directly in Tina, letting the team stage callouts and metrics alongside gallery imagery. Designers could update the narrative while previewing how metrics landed within the project canvas.

View the static storyboard variant if animations feel distracting.

Designer, storyteller, collaborator

About Abhinav

Mumbai, India

I help product teams choreograph motion into accessible storytelling moments across the journey.

I love building systems where motion tells the story and keeps the team aligned. The same facilitation energy I bring to workshops helps teams ship expressive interactions without leaving anyone behind.

✨ North star

Every animation should explain what just happened or what happens next—never just because it looks good.

Product Craft

Let’s collaborate
